attributes.action: Give 30% hourly bonus pay to all NHS workers during COVID19 up to 5000£/year
attributes.additional_details: During this hard times the NHS staff need more than clapping. USA is discussing in senate to give 13$ per hour up to 10000$ to all essential workers even Romania one of the poorest country in EU gave a lump sum of 500€ to their medical staff . German nurses make in average 25% more than british nurses.  I think our nurses deserve more than clapping. https://docs.house.gov/billsthisweek/20200511/BILLS-116hr6800ih.pdf
attributes.background: To give  an extra payment of 30% of their hourly rate for all NHS staff for  the hours worked during the covid-19 pandemic
